title: Dane logowania
content: Witam od niedawna borykam się z problemem że firefox resetuje wszystkie zapisane dane logowania, po zamknięciu programu od nowa muszę wprowadzić dane. Resetuje także zapamiętane ciasteczka witryn, jak poradzić sobie z tym problemem? Nie pomaga resetowanie przeglądarki oraz czyszczenie...
creator: maciejfoxx

title: Recupero data a seguito incendio
content:
Il 20 aprile c.a. ho subito un incendio che ha distrutto tutti i miei dispositivi. Ho dovuto ricominciare da ZERO, ora ho tel Android e iPad. Ho tentato di sincronizzare i nuovi device con il vecchio settaggio, ma senza risultato, è possibile farlo? E se si come? Sarebbe morto utile, dato che tenevo tutte le password sul browser. 

Ho potuto recuperare la mia Mail principale grazie a Google.crome, con cui è stato possibile recuperare molto ma nn  tutto .

Sono sempre stato un entusiasta sostenitore dei prodotti Mozilla (Firefox,FileZilla) ma nel momento dell’ ESTREMO BISOGNO ho dovuto affidarmi ai vs.rivali In attesa di vs risposta qualificata, i miei più sinceri auguri di buonLavoro Pietro zambiasi
creator: info7332

title: aggiornamento pagine internet
content:
egeregi, con l'ultima release firefox non aggiorna le pagine come dovrebbe. mi spiego in modo chiaro cosi: andate sul mio sito: http://fabioar58.altervista.org nella parte sotto ci sono i grafici meteo. ebbene, con firefox aggiorno la pagina ma i grafici rimangono quelli vecchi, non si aggiornano. fino alla versione precedente di firefox si aggiornavano e funzionava tutto benissimo. se clicco su un grafico, e faccio aggiorna, ugualmente rimane il grafico vecchio che era nella cache.

se uso microsoft edge, entro nella pagina e cliccando su aggiorna i grafici si aggiornano, ossia vengono scaricati dal server. idem se clicco sul singolo grafico e clicco aggiorna.

per ora mi tocca di usare edge.

ciao. fabio.
creator: fabio.a.rinaldo

title: Scrollbar disappearing
content: I find it pretty annoying that the scrollbar keeps disappearing. How do I stop that. Also I would like it a little thicker like it used to be.
creator: frank.andersen85

title: Saving multiple windows
content: I have several windows open, each with different type tabs--i.e., dancing, gardening, etc. How do I save these windows so I can open them when I wish? I don't need them all open at the same time and having them all open uses up too many resources. Thanks in advance, Elizabeth
creator: baker_eliz

title: Vulnerbilities for FF 100.0
content:
Hi, Acronis on my Mac (Big Sur) reports a high number of CRITICAL vulnerabilities relating to Veracode: e.g. ERROR: 'VERACODE:32409' is a malformed CVE-ID - and numerous other code numbers - too many to list.

I have just checked and my FF reports it is 100.0 still and no updates. I note that this was a problem in FF 84.x and was fixed. Can anyone advise me if there is a security update to FF and also should I avoid using it for the time being, subject to a fix?

Ross
creator: DIOGENES.CONSULTING

title: Descargas fallidas
content: Al deswcargar una página SEGURA, el panel de descargas (el icono de la flecha con la bandeja) siempre me da el error "descarga fallida". Tenfgo que pulsar sobre el elemento de la lista de descargas para descargarlo. Por ejemplo, esto ocurre con la página de la NASA https://apod.nasa.gov. La he puesto en sitios de confianza, pero no funciona (parece que firefox hace caso omiso de esta lista). No es la única página en la que ocurre.
creator: santaklaus

title: Tabs are disappearing
content: My tabs keep disappearing. I have multiple tabs open but some of them just disappear for no apparent reason and I can't bring them back. I'm not in full screen mode and not toggling with the F11 key. Firefox is up to date and I've tried restarting my laptop.

title: Why my code work fine on chrome but not firefox?
content:
Here is my code:

<meta charset="utf-8"> <style> .fullCard, .lowerHalfCard, .upperHalfCard, .fullCard-after, .lowerHalfCard-after, .upperHalfCard-after { background-color: inherit; border-radius: 10px; height: 100%; width: 100%; position: absolute; align-items: center; display: flex; justify-content: center; vertical-align:middle; } .fullCard-after::after, .upperHalfCard-after::after{ content: ""; display: block; position: absolute; height: 4px; background-color: inherit; width: 100%; top: calc(50% - 2px); } .lowerHalfCard-after::after{ content: ""; display: block; position: absolute; height: 4px; background-color: inherit; width: 100%; top: calc(50% - 2px); } .lowerHalfCard, .lowerHalfCard-after{ clip-path: polygon(0% 50%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 0% 100%); } .upperHalfCard, .upperHalfCard-after{ clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 0% 50%); } .splitFlap { background-color:black; box-sizing: border-box; border-radius: 10px; width: 100px; height: 150px; position: relative; } .rotate0to90 { animation-name: r0to90; } .rotate90to0 { animation-name: r90to0; } .rotate0to_90 { animation-name: r0to_90; } .rotate_90to0 { animation-name: r_90to0; } .rotate0to90, .rotate90to0, .rotate0to_90, .rotate_90to0 { animation-duration: 0.3s; animation-fill-mode: forwards; } @keyframes r0to90 { from { transform:rotateX(0deg); } to { transform: rotateX(90deg); } } @keyframes r90to0 { from { transform: rotateX(90deg); } to { transform: rotateX(0deg); } } @keyframes r0to_90 { from { transform: rotateX(0deg); } to { transform: rotateX(-90deg); } } @keyframes r_90to0 { from { transform: rotateX(-90deg); } to { transform: rotateX(0deg); } } .transform0to_90 { transform: rotateX(-90deg); } .transform0to90 { transform: rotateX(90deg); } .hide{ display:none } .zIndex2 { z-index: 2; } .zIndex4 { z-index: 4; } .zIndex10 { z-index: 10; } .blue{ background-color: blue } .green{ background-color: green } .red{ background-color: red } .orange{ background-color: orange } </style> <script> let baseDiv,lowerDiv,middleDiv,upperDiv; document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",()=>{ baseDiv=document.getElementById("base"); lowerDiv=document.getElementById("lower"); middleDiv=document.getElementById("middle"); upperDiv=document.getElementById("upper"); }); let backward=()=>{ middleDiv.innerHTML=baseDiv.innerHTML; lowerDiv.classList.add("rotate0to90"); middleDiv.className="upperHalfCard-after transform0to_90 zIndex4"; } let forward=()=>{ middleDiv.innerHTML=baseDiv.innerHTML; upperDiv.classList.add("rotate0to_90"); middleDiv.className="lowerHalfCard-after transform0to90 zIndex4"; } let upperHandler=()=>{ middleDiv.classList.add("rotate90to0"); upperDiv.classList.replace("zIndex4","zIndex2"); } let lowerHandler=()=>{ lowerDiv.classList.replace("zIndex4","zIndex2"); middleDiv.classList.add("rotate_90to0"); } let middleHandler=()=>{ upperDiv.innerHTML=baseDiv.innerHTML; lowerDiv.innerHTML=baseDiv.innerHTML; middleDiv.className="hide"; upperDiv.className="upperHalfCard-after zIndex4"; lowerDiv.className="lowerHalfCard-after zIndex2"; } </script>

<button onclick="forward()"> + </button> <button onclick="backward()"> - </button> <button onclick="setHinge()">Set Hinge</button>

title: Download not working with "file not commonly downloaded"
content: I am currently encountering a deeply frustrating issue with Firefox. I develop video games; I am attempting to download a zip file from Steam Workshop containing a player-created mod. I have this file on my other computer--it is not malicious. It contains nothing more than XML files and a jpg. Every time I attempt to download this file using Firefox, Firefox blocks the download as a potential security risk. I then click the download manager and tell it to download anyway; Firefox then pretends to complete the download, but in actuality the file remains at 0 bytes and a "part" file is created containing what I can only assume is the actual data.
creator: cstern

content:

I have tried disabling the password and re-enable, that does not work. If there is another setting I haven't found it yet.

title: how to change background color back to white instead of black
